org.smscom.prime.core
Class PrimeApplication

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.Restlet
      org.restlet.Application
          org.smscom.prime.core.PrimeApplication
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.restlet.Uniform, IMessageHandler, IPrimeApplication
Direct Known Subclasses:
GoPrimeApplication
public class PrimeApplication
extends org.restlet.Application
implements IPrimeApplication, IMessageHandler

Applications should extend this class in order to benefit from the PRIME framework.

Author:
Mauro Caporuscio

setHTTPServerParameters

public void setHTTPServerParameters(java.lang.Integer maxThreads,
                                    java.lang.Integer maxQueued)
Specified by:
setHTTPServerParameters in interface IPrimeApplication
Parameters:
maxThreads - (DEFAULT = 10) Maximum number of worker threads that can service calls. If this number is reached then additional calls are queued if the "maxQueued" value hasn't been reached.
maxQueued - (DEFAULT = 0) Maximum number of calls that can be queued if there aren't any worker thread available to service them. If the value is '0', then no queue is used and calls are rejected if no worker thread is immediately available. If the value is '-1', then an unbounded queue is used and calls are never rejected.

registerResource

public CURI registerResource(java.lang.Class<? extends PrimeResource> resource)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
Description copied from interface: IPrimeApplication
Registers a new resource into the DNS. Description is automatically retrieved from the Resource Repository (it must have the same file name of the Class resource given as input).

Specified by:
registerResource in interface IPrimeApplication
Parameters:
resource - The Java class implementing the resource to be deployed.

java.lang.Exception

unobserve

public void unobserve(URI uri,
                      NotificationHandler notificationHandler)
Description copied from interface: IPrimeApplication
Stop observing the given URI (either a cURI or aURI)

Specified by:
unobserve in interface IPrimeApplication
Parameters:
uri - A NotificationHandler can be associated to many different URI at the same time. URI specifies the topic of interest to be removed. if uri is null NotificationHandler is removed from all topics.
notificationHandler - The NotificationHandler in charge to handle notifications.

public void handleMessage(PrimeMessage pck)
Description copied from interface: IMessageHandler

handleMessage in interface IMessageHandler
Parameters:
